html:
Preferred gifts in Persona 5: The Phantom X are just like regular gifts, but they’ll give your synergies an extra boost.

As you meet and hang out with confidants in Persona 5: The Phantom X, your synergy will increase, but you can give them a gift to increase your synergy even further. However, be on the lookout for each confidant’s preferred gifts to level up your synergies even faster.

Here are the best gifts to give characters in Persona 5: The Phantom X and how to get them.

Table of Contents

  • Best gifts to give each character in Persona 5: The Phantom X
  • Best gifts for Merope
  • Best gifts for Yui
  • Best gifts for Tomoko Noge
  • Best gifts for Yaoling Li
  • Best gifts for Motoha Arai
  • Best gifts for Kayo Tomiyama

Best gifts to give each character in Persona 5: The Phantom X

Image: Black Wings Game Studio/Sega via Polygon

The best gifts to give to each character will always depend on their preferences. Luckily, Persona 5: The Phantom X makes it easy for you by showing you each characters’ preferred gifts in the “Likes” tab of the “Synergy” menu.

Some preferred gifts are more valuable than others if you look at their synergy to cost ratio, but as you reach higher synergy levels, you’ll need to purchase “less valuable” items to get a lot of synergy in one go. This does go without saying, you should always try to give each gift once because of the first-time bonus. We recommend purchasing a gift just before your hang out — except when there is a yellow “Form Bonds” heart. You won’t be able to give a gift on these hang outs.

Make sure you’re not wasting some of your more valuable gifts because there will be moments where synergy doesn’t carry over to the next level. For example, for Merope, you’ll need to create Personas with specific spells before you can level up your bond, so you shouldn’t give a gift if you’re close to the level threshold. The game does warn you if your synergy won’t carry over, so be sure to read the pop-ups!

For a list of each character’s preferred gifts, check out the sections below.

Best gifts for Merope

Image: Black Wings Game Studio/Sega via Polygon

Merope’s gifts revolve around her love of idol and maid culture. Due to her ability to summon Phantom Idols, she naturally grew interested in idols in the human world.
